GV03sb_06_u:1030: etadupastutya varma karoti parivatībhiḥ parīva hi pura āgneyībhiragnipurāmevāsmā
GV03sb_06_u:1031: etatkaroti sā haiṣāgnipurā dīpyamānā tiṣṭhati tisṛbhistripuramevāsmā etatkaroti
GV03sb_06_u:1032: tasmādu haitatpurām paramaṃ rūpaṃ yattripuraṃ savai varṣīyasā-varṣīyasā candasā
GV03sb_06_u:1033: parām-parāṃ lekhāṃ varīyasīṃ karoti tasmātpurām parā-parā varīyasī lekhā bhavanti
GV03sb_06_u:1036: athainamasyāṃ khanati | etadvai devā abibhayuryadvai na imamahi rakṣāṃsi nāṣṭrā
GV03sb_06_u:1037: na hanyuriti tasmā imāmevātmānamakurvanguptyā ātmātmānaṃ gopsyatīti sā
GV03sb_06_u:1038: samambilā syāttadasyeyamātmā bhavati yadveva samaṃbilā yonirvā iyaṃ reta idaṃ
GV03sb_06_u:1039: yadvai retaso yonimatiricyate 'muyā tadbhavatyatha yannyūnaṃ vyṛddhaṃ tadetadvai
GV03sb_06_u:1040: retasaḥ samṛddhaṃ yatsamambilaṃ catuḥsraktireṣa bhavati catasro vai diśaḥ
GV03sb_06_u:1049: jyotiṣmantaṃ tvāgne supratīkamiti | jyotiṣmānvā ayamagniḥ supratīko 'jasreṇa
GV03sb_06_u:1051: pṛthivyāḥ sadhasthādagnim purīṣyamaṅgirasvatkhanāma iti śivam prajābhyo
GV03sb_06_u:1057: sa vai khanāmi khanāma iti khanati | khanāmīti vā eta prajāpatirakhanatkhanāma iti
GV03sb_06_u:1060: sa vā abhryā khanan | vācā khanāmi khanāma ityāha vāgvā abhrirārambhāyaiveyaṃ
GV03sb_06_u:1061: vaiṇavī kriyate vācā vā etamabhryā devā akhanaṃstathaivainamayametadvācaivābhryā
GV03sb_06_u:1064: athainaṃ kṛṣṇājine sambharati | yajñā vai kṛṣṇājinaṃ yajñaevainametatsambharati
GV03sb_06_u:1066: yajño vai kṛṣṇājinam prajāpatirvai yajño 'nirukto vai prajāpatiruttaratastasyopari
GV03sb_06_u:1069: athaina puṣkaraparṇe sambharati | yonirvai puṣkaraparṇaṃ yonau tadretaḥ siñcati
GV03sb_06_u:1070: yadvai yonau retaḥ sicyate tatprajaniṣṇu bhavati tanmantreṇopastṛṇāti vāgvai mantro
GV03sb_06_u:1073: apām pṛṣṭhamasi yoniragneriti | apāṃ hyetatpṛṣṭhaṃ yonirhyetadagneḥ
GV03sb_06_u:1074: samudramabhitaḥ pinvamānamiti samudro hyetadabhitaḥ pinvate vardhamāno
GV03sb_06_u:1075: mahāṃ ā ca puṣkara iti vardhamāno mahīyasva puṣkara ityetaddivo mātrayā
GV03sb_06_u:1076: varimṇā pathasvetyanuvimārṣṭyasau vā āditya eṣo 'gnirno haitamanyo divo varimā
GV03sb_06_u:1079: taduttaraṃ kṛṣṇājinādupastṛṇāti | yajño vai kṛṣṇājinamiyaṃ vai kṛṣṇājinamiyamu vai
GV03sb_06_u:1080: yajño 'syāṃ hi yajñastāyate dyauṣpuṣkaraparṇamāpo vai dyaurāpaḥ
GV03sb_06_u:1083: athaine abhimṛśati | saṃjñāmevābhyāmetatkaroti śarma ca stho varma ca stha iti
GV03sb_06_u:1084: śarma ca hyasyaite varma cācidre bahule ubhe ityacidre hyete bahule ubhe vyacasvatī
GV03sb_06_u:1088: saṃvasāthāṃ svarvidā | samīcī urasā tmaneti saṃvasāthāmenaṃ svarvidā samīcī urasā
GV03sb_06_u:1090: eṣo 'gniḥ sa eṣa jyotiṣmānajasrastamete antarā bibhṛtastasmādāha
GV03sb_06_u:1094: tāvataivābhyāmetatsaṃjñāṃ karotyatho dvayaṃ hyevaitadrūpaṃ kṛṣṇājinaṃ ca
GV03sb_06_u:1097: atha mṛtpiṇḍamabhimṛśati | purīṣyo 'sīti paśavyo 'sītyetadviśvabharā ityeṣa hīdaṃ
GV03sb_06_u:1098: sarvam bibhartyatharvā tvā prathamo niramanthadagna iti prāṇo vā atharvā prāṇo vā
GV03sb_06_u:1102: athainam parigṛhṇāti | abhryā ca dakṣiṇato hastena ca hastenaivottaratastvāmagne
GV03sb_06_u:1103: puṣkarādadhyatharvā niramanthatetyāpo vai puṣkaram prāṇo 'tharvā prāṇo vā
GV03sb_06_u:1104: etamagre 'dbhyo niramanthanmūrdhno viśvasya vāghata ityasya sarvasya mūrdhna
GV03sb_06_u:1107: tamu tvā dadhyaṅṅṛṣiḥ | putra īdhe atharvaṇa iti vāgvai dadhyaṅṅātharvaṇaḥ sa enaṃ
GV03sb_06_u:1108: tata ainddha vṛtrahaṇam puraṃdaramiti pāpmā vai vṛtraḥ pāpmahanam
GV03sb_06_u:1111: tamu tvā pāthyo vṛṣā | samīdhe dasyuhantamamiti mano vai pāthyo vṛṣā sa enaṃ
GV03sb_06_u:1112: tata ainddha dhanaṃjayaṃ raṇe-raṇa iti yathaiva yajustathā bandhuḥ
GV03sb_06_u:1114: gāyatrībhiḥ | prāṇo gāyatrī prāṇamevāsminnetaddadhāti nnetaddadhāti tāsāṃ nava
GV03sb_06_u:1115: padāni nava vai prāṇāḥ saptatisṛbhistrayo vai prāṇāḥ prāṇa udāno vyānastānevāsmi
GV03sb_06_u:1118: athaite triṣṭubhā uttare bhavataḥ | ātmā vai triṣṭubātmānamevāsyaitābhyāṃ
GV03sb_06_u:1119: saṃskaroti sīda hota sva u loke cikitvānityagnirvai hotā tasyaiṣa svo loko
GV03sb_06_u:1120: yatkṛṣṇājinaṃ cikitvāniti vidvānityetatsādayā yajñaṃ sukṛtasya yonāviti kṛṣṇājinaṃ vai
GV03sb_06_u:1122: yajāsītyetadagne bṛhadyajamāne vayo dhā iti yajamānāyāśiṣamāśāste
GV03sb_06_u:1124: ni hotā hotṛṣadane vidāna iti | agnirvai hotā kṛṣṇājinaṃ hotṛṣadanaṃ vidāna iti
GV03sb_06_u:1125: vidvānityetattveṣo dīdivāṃ asadatsudakṣa iti tveṣo dīpyamāno 'sadatsudakṣa
GV03sb_06_u:1127: sahasrambharaḥ śucijthvo agniriti sarvaṃ vai sahasraṃ sarvambharaḥ śucijihvo
GV03sb_06_u:1130: athaiṣā bṛhatyuttamā bhavati | bṛhatīṃ vā eṣa saṃcito 'bhisampadyate yādṛgvai
GV03sb_06_u:1131: yonau retaḥ sicyate tādṛgjāyate tadyadetāmatra bṛhatīṃ karoti tasmādeṣa saṃcito
GV03sb_06_u:1134: saṃsīdasva mahāṃ asīti | idamevaitadretaḥ siktaṃ saṃsādayati tasmādyonau retaḥ
GV03sb_06_u:1135: siktaṃ saṃsīdati śocasva devavītama iti dīpyasva devavītama ityetadvi dhūmamagne
GV03sb_06_u:1136: aruṣam miyedhya sṛja praśasta darśatamiti yadā vā eṣa samidhyate 'thaiṣa
GV03sb_06_u:1137: dhūmamaruṣaṃ visṛjate darśatamiti dadṛśa iva hyeṣaḥ
GV03sb_06_u:1139: tāḥ ṣaṭ sampadyante | ṣadṛtavaḥ saṃvatsaraḥ saṃvatsaro 'gniryāvānagniryāvatyasya
GV03sb_06_u:1141: tadbṛhatīmabhisampadyate bṛhatī hi saṃvatsaro dvādaśa paurṇamāsyo dvādaśāṣṭakā
GV03sb_06_u:1143: dakṣiṇato vā udagyonau retaḥ sicyata eṣo asyaitarhi yoniravicedamāharati retaso
GV03sb_06_u:1146: atha tatrāpa upaninayati | yadvā asyai kṣataṃ yadviliṣṭamadbhirvai tatsaṃdhīyate
GV03sb_06_u:1149: apo devīrupasṛja | madhumatīrayakṣmāya prajābhya iti raso vai madhu
GV03sb_06_u:1153: athaināṃ vāyunā saṃdadhāti | yadvā asyai kṣataṃ yadviliṣṭaṃ vāyunā vai
GV03sb_06_u:1154: tatsaṃdhīyate vāyunaivāsyā etatkṣataṃ viliṣṭaṃ saṃtanoti saṃdadhāti
GV03sb_06_u:1156: saṃ te vāyurmātariśvā dadhātviti | ayaṃ vai vāyurmātariśvā yo 'yam pavata uttānāyā
GV03sb_06_u:1157: hṛdayaṃ yadvikastamityuttānāyā hyasyā etaddhṛdayaṃ vikastaṃ yo devānāṃ carasi
GV03sb_06_u:1158: prāṇathenetyeṣa hi sarveṣāṃ devānāṃ carati prāṇathena kasmai deva vaṣaḍastu
GV03sb_06_u:1159: tubhyamiti prajāpatirvai kastasmā evaitadimāṃ vaṣaṭkaroti no haitāvatyanyāhutirasti
GV03sb_06_u:1162: athaināṃ digbhiḥ saṃdadhāti | yadvā asyai kṣataṃ yadviliṣṭaṃ digbhirvai
GV03sb_06_u:1163: tatsaṃdhīyate digbhirevāsyā etatkṣataṃ viliṣṭaṃ saṃtanoti saṃdadhāti sa imāṃ cemāṃ
GV03sb_06_u:1164: ca diśau saṃdadhāti tasmādete diśau saṃhite athemāṃ cemāṃ ca tasmādvevaite saṃhite
GV03sb_06_u:1165: ityagre 'theti athetyatheti taddakṣiṇāvṛttaddhi devatrānayānayā vai bheṣajaṃ kriyate
GV03sb_06_u:1168: atha kṛṣṇājinaṃ ca puṣkaraparṇaṃ ca samudgṛhṇāti | yonirvai puṣkaraparṇaṃ yonyā
GV03sb_06_u:1169: tadretaḥ siktaṃ samudgṛhṇāti tasmādyonyā retaḥ siktaṃ samudgṛhyate sujāto jyotiṣā
GV03sb_06_u:1170: saha śarma varūthamāsadatsvariti sujāto hyeṣa jyotiṣā saha śarma caitadvarūthaṃ ca
GV03sb_06_u:1173: athainamupanahyati | yonau tadreto yunakti tasmādyonau reto yuktaṃ na niṣpadyate
GV03sb_06_u:1174: yoktreṇa yoktreṇa hi yogyaṃ yuñjanti mauñjena trivṛtā tasyokto bandhuḥ
GV03sb_06_u:1176: tatparyasyati | vāso agne viśvarūpaṃ saṃvyayasva vibhāvasaviti varuṇyā vai yajñe
GV03sb_06_u:1179: athainamādāyottiṣṭhati | asau vā āditya eṣo 'gniramu tadādityamutthāpayatyudu
GV03sb_06_u:1180: tiṣṭha svadhvaretyadhvaro vai yajña udu tiṣṭha suyajñiyetyetadavā no devyā dhiyeti
GV03sb_06_u:1181: yā te daivī dhīstayā no 'vetyetaddūśe ca bhāsā bṛhatā suśukvaniriti darśanāya ca
GV03sb_06_u:1182: bhāsā bṛhatā suśukvanirityetadāgne yāhi suśastibhiriti ye voḍhāraste suśastaya āgne
GV03sb_06_u:1185: athainamita ūrdhvam prāñcam pragṛhṇāti | asau vā āditya eṣo 'gniramuṃ
GV03sb_06_u:1186: tadādityamita ūrdhvam prāñcaṃ dadhāti tasmādasāvāditya ita ūrdhvaḥ prāṅ dhīyata
GV03sb_06_u:1187: ūrdhva ū ṣu ṇa ūtaye tiṣṭhā devo na saviteti yathaiva yajustathā bandhurūrdhvo
GV03sb_06_u:1188: vājasya sanitetyūrdhvo vā eṣa tiṣṭhanvājamannaṃ sanoti
GV03sb_06_u:1189: yadañjibhirvāghadbhirvihvayāmaha iti raśmayo vā etasyāñjayo vāghatastānetadāha
GV03sb_06_u:1193: hasta eṣa bhavatyatha paśūnabhimantrayate | etadvā eṣu devāḥ sambhariṣyantaḥ
GV03sb_06_u:1196: so 'śvamabhimantrayate | sa jāto garbho asi rodasyoritīte vai dyāvāpṛthivī rodasī
GV03sb_06_u:1197: tayoreṣa jāto garbho 'gne cārurvibhṛta oṣadhīṣviti sarvāsu hyeṣa cārurvibhṛta
GV03sb_06_u:1198: oṣadhiṣu citraḥ śiśuḥ pari tamāṃsyaktūniti citro vā eṣa śiśuḥ pareṇa
GV03sb_06_u:1199: tamāṃsyaktūnatirocate pra mātṛbhyo adhi kanikradadgā ityoṣadhayo vā etasya
GV03sb_06_u:1200: mātarastābhya eṣa kanikradatpraiti tadaśve vīryaṃ dadhāti
GV03sb_06_u:1202: atha rāsabham | sthiro bhava vīḍvaṅga āśurbhava vājyarvanniti sthiraśca bhava
GV03sb_06_u:1204: purīṣavāhaṇa iti pṛthurbhava suśīmastvamagneḥ paśavyavāhana ityetattadrāsabhe
GV03sb_06_u:1207: athājam | śikhā bhava prajābhyo mānuṣībhyastvamaṅgira ityaṅgirā vā agnirāgneyo
GV03sb_06_u:1215: nopaspṛśati vajro vai paśavo reta idaṃ nedidaṃ reto vajreṇa hinasānītyatho agnirayam
GV03sb_06_u:1218: tamaśvasyopariṣṭātpragṛhṇāti | praitu vājī kanikradaditi praitu vājī kanikradyamāna
GV03sb_06_u:1219: ityetannānadadrāsabhaḥ patveti tadaśvasya yajuṣi rāsabhaṃ nirāha tadrāsabhe śucaṃ
GV03sb_06_u:1220: dadhāti bharannagnim purīṣyam mā pādyāyuṣaḥ pureti bharannagnim paśavya mo
GV03sb_06_u:1223: atha rāsabhasya | vṛṣāgniṃ vṛṣaṇam bharanniti vṛṣā vā agnirvṛṣā rāsabhaḥ sa vṛṣā
GV03sb_06_u:1224: vṛṣāṇam bharatyapāṃ garbhaṃ samudriyamityapāṃ hyeṣa garbhaḥ
GV03sb_06_u:1227: athāpādatte | agna āyāhi vītaya ityavitava ityetattadenam brahmaṇā
GV03sb_06_u:1230: athājasya | ṛtaṃ satyamṛtaṃ satyamityayaṃ vā agnirṛtamasāvādityaḥ satyaṃ yadi
GV03sb_06_u:1235: tāvataivainametatsambharati tribhiḥ purastādabhimantrayate tatṣaṭ tasyokto bandhuḥ
GV03sb_06_u:1238: yatāmaśvaḥ prathama etyatha rāsabho 'thajaḥ kṣatraṃ vā anvaśvo vaiśyaṃ ca śūdraṃ
GV03sb_06_u:1241: tadyadito yatām | aśvaḥ prathama eti tasmākṣatriyam prathamaṃ yantamitare trayo
GV03sb_06_u:1242: varṇāḥ paścādanuyantyatha yadamuta āyatāmajaḥ prathama eti tasmādbrāhmaṇam
GV03sb_06_u:1243: prathamaṃ yantamitare trayo varṇāḥ paścādanuyantyatha yannaiveto yatāṃ nāmuto
GV03sb_06_u:1244: rāsabhaḥ prathama eti tasmānna kadā cana brāhmaṇaśca kṣatriyā vaiśyaṃ ca śūdraṃ
GV03sb_06_u:1251: tamajasyopariṣṭātpragṛhṇannaiti | āgneyo vā ajaḥ svenaivainametadātmanā svayā
GV03sb_06_u:1252: devatayā sambharatyatho brahma vā ajo brahmaṇaivainametatsambharati
GV03sb_06_u:1255: yuṣmā ityetaddhaitasmādāyata oṣadhayo bibhyati yadvai no 'yaṃ na hiṃsyāditi
GV03sb_06_u:1256: tābhya evainametacamayati pratyenam modadhvaṃ śivo vo 'bhyaiti na vo hiṃsiṣyatīti
GV03sb_06_u:1257: vyasyanviśvā anirā amīvā niṣīdanno apa durmatiṃ jahīti vyasyanviśvā
GV03sb_06_u:1260: oṣadhayaḥ pratigṛbhṇīta | puṣpavatīḥ supippalā ityetaddhaitāsāṃ samṛddhaṃ rūpaṃ
GV03sb_06_u:1261: yatpuṣpavatyaḥ supippalāḥ samṛddhā enam pratigṛhṇītetyetadayaṃ vo garbha ṛtviyaḥ
GV03sb_06_u:1262: pratnaṃ sadhasthamāsadadityayaṃ vo garbha ṛtavyaḥ sanātanaṃ
GV03sb_06_u:1270: pariśritam bhavati | etadvai devā abibhayuryadvai na imamiha rakṣāṃsi nāṣṭrā na
GV03sb_06_u:1271: hanyuriti tasmā etām puram paryaśrayaṃstathaivāsmā ayametām puram
GV03sb_06_u:1272: pariśrayatyatho yonirvā iyaṃ reta idaṃ tira iva vai yonau retaḥ sicyate
GV03sb_06_u:1273: yonirūpametatkriyate tasmādapi svayā jāyayā tira ivaiva cicariṣati
GV03sb_06_u:1278: vi pājasā pṛthunā śośucāna iti | vi pājasā pṛthunā dīpyamāna ityetadbādhasva dviṣo
GV03sb_06_u:1279: rakṣaso amīvā iti bādhasva sarvānpāpmana ityetatsuśarmaṇo bṛhataḥ śarmaṇi
GV03sb_06_u:1282: athājalomānyācidya | udīcaḥ prācaḥ paśūnprasṛjatyeṣā hobhayeṣāṃ devamanuṣyāṇāṃ
GV03sb_06_u:1283: digyadudīcī prācyetasyāṃ taddiśi paśūndadhāti tasmādubhaye devamanuṣyāḥ
GV03sb_06_u:1286: parṇakaṣāyaniṣpakvā etā āpo bhavanti | sthemne nveva yadveva parṇakaṣāyeṇa
GV03sb_06_u:1287: somo vai parṇaścandramā u vai soma etadu vā
GV03sb_06_u:1290: tā upasṛjati | āpo hi ṣṭhā mayobhuva iti yāṃ vai devatāmṛgabhyanūktā yāṃ yajuḥ
GV03sb_06_u:1291: saiva devatā sa 'rkṣo devatā tadyajustā haitā āpa evaiṣa tricastadyā amūrāpa ekaṃ
GV03sb_06_u:1294: atha phenaṃ janayitvānvavadadhāti | yadeva tatpheno dvitīyaṃ rūpamasṛjyata
GV03sb_06_u:1295: tadevaitadrūpaṃ karotyatha yāmeva tatra mṛdaṃ saṃyauti saiva mṛdyattattatīyaṃ
GV03sb_06_u:1296: rūpamasṛjyataitebhyo vā eṣa rūpebhyo 'gre 'sṛjyata tebhya evainametajjanayati
GV03sb_06_u:1298: athājalomaiḥ saṃsṛjati | sthemne nveva yadvevājalomairetadvā enaṃ devāḥ paśubhyo
GV03sb_06_u:1300: tadyadajalomairevāje hi sarveṣām paśūnāṃ rūpamatha yalloma loma hi rūpam
GV03sb_06_u:1302: mitraḥ saṃsṛjya | pṛthivīm bhūmiṃ ca jyotiṣā saheti prāṇo vai mitraḥ prāṇo vā
GV03sb_06_u:1303: etadagre karmākarotsujātaṃ jātavedasamayakṣmāya tvā saṃsṛjāmi prajābhya iti
GV03sb_06_u:1306: athaitattrayam piṣṭam bhavati | śarkarāśmāyorasastena saṃsṛjati sthemne nveva
GV03sb_06_u:1310: rudrāḥ saṃsṛjya | pṛthivīm bṛhajjyotiḥ samīdhira ityasau vā āditya eṣo 'gniretadvai
GV03sb_06_u:1311: tadrudrāḥ saṃsṛjya pṛthivīm bṛhajjyotiḥ samīdhire teṣām bhānurajasra icukro
GV03sb_06_u:1312: deveṣu rocata ityeṣa vā eṣām bhānurajasraḥ śukro deveṣu rocate
GV03sb_06_u:1317: atha prayauti | saṃsṛṣṭāṃ vasubhi rudrairiti saṃsṛṣṭā hyeṣā vasubhiśca bhavati
GV03sb_06_u:1318: yanmitreṇa tadvasubhiryadrudraistadrudrairdhīraiḥ karmaṇyām mṛdamiti dhīrā hi te
GV03sb_06_u:1319: karmaṇyo iyam mṛddhastābhyām mṛdvīṃ kṛtvā sinīvālī kṛṇotu tāmiti vāgvai sinīvālī
GV03sb_06_u:1322: sinīvālī sukapardā sukurīrā svaupaśeti | yoṣā vai sinīvālyetadu vai yoṣāyai
GV03sb_06_u:1323: samṛddhaṃ rūpaṃ yatsukapardā sukurīrā svaupaśā samardhayatyevaināmetatsā
GV03sb_06_u:1324: tubhyamadite mahyokhāṃ dadhātu hastayoritīyaṃ vā aditirmahyasyai tadāha
GV03sb_06_u:1326: ukhāṃ kṛṇotu | śaktyā bāhubhyāmaditirdhiyeti śaktyā ca hi karoti bāhubhyāṃ ca
GV03sb_06_u:1327: dhiyā ca mātā putraṃ yathopasthe sāgnim bibhartu garbha eti yathā mātā
GV03sb_06_u:1331: dvābhyāṃ saṃsṛjati tatpañca pañcacitiko 'gniḥ pañca 'rtavaḥ saṃvatsaraḥ saṃvatsaro
GV03sb_06_u:1337: atha mṛtpiṇḍamapādatte | yāvantaṃ nidhaye 'lam makhasya śiro 'sīti yajño vai
GV03sb_06_u:1338: makhastasyaitacira āhavanīyo vai yajñasya śira āhavanīyamu vā etaṃ ceṣyanbhavati
GV03sb_06_u:1341: yadvevāha makhasya śiro 'sīti | jāyata eṣa etadyaccīyate śīrṣato vai mukhato
GV03sb_06_u:1342: jāyamāno jāyate śīṣato mukhato jāyamāno jāyātā iti
GV03sb_06_u:1344: tam prathayati | vasavastvā kṛṇvantu gāyatreṇa candasāṅgirasvadityayaṃ haiṣa loko
GV03sb_06_u:1346: candasā karotyaṅgirasvaditi prāṇo vā aṅgirā dhruvāsīti sthirāsītyetadatho
GV03sb_06_u:1347: pratiṣṭhitāsīti pṛthivyasīti pṛthivī hyeṣa nidhirdhārayā mayi prajāṃ rāyaspoṣaṃ
GV03sb_06_u:1348: gaupatyaṃ suvīryaṃ sajātānyajamānāyetyetadvai vasava imaṃ lokaṃ kṛtvā
GV03sb_06_u:1356: hyeṣa uddhirdhārayā mayi prajāṃ rāyaspoṣaṃ gaupatyaṃ suvīryaṃ
GV03sb_06_u:1364: aṅgirā dhruvāsīti sthirāsītyetadatho pratiṣṭhitāsīti dyaurasīti dyaurhyeṣa
GV03sb_06_u:1365: uddhirdhārayā mayi prajāṃ rāyaspoṣaṃ gaupatyaṃ suvīryaṃ
GV03sb_06_u:1369: athaitena caturthena yajuṣā karoti | viśve tvā devā vaiśvānarāḥ kṛṇvantvānuṣṭubhena
GV03sb_06_u:1370: candasāṅgirasvaditi diśo haitadyajuretadvai viśve devā vaiśvānarā eṣu
GV03sb_06_u:1372: lokeṣūkhāyāmetena caturthena yajuṣā diśo dadhātyaṅgirasvaditi prāṇo vā aṅgirā
GV03sb_06_u:1373: dhruvāsīti sthirāsītyetadatho pratiṣṭhitāsīti diśo 'sīti diśo hyetadyajurdhārayā mayi
GV03sb_06_u:1374: prajāṃ rāyaspoṣaṃ gaupatyaṃ suvīryaṃ sajātānyajamānāyetyetadvai viśve devā
GV03sb_06_u:1375: vaiśvānarā diśaḥ kṛtvā tāsvetāmāśiṣamāśāsata tathaivaitadyajamāno diśaḥ kṛtvā
GV03sb_06_u:1378: tenaitenāntarataśca bāhyataśca karoti | tasmādeṣāṃ lokānāmantarataśca bāhyataśca
GV03sb_06_u:1381: tām prādeśamātrīmevordhvāṃ karoti | prādeśamātrīṃ tiraścīm prādeśamātro vai
GV03sb_06_u:1384: sā yadi varṣīyasī prādeśātsyāt | etena yajuṣā hrasīyasīṃ kuryādyadi hrasīyasyetena
GV03sb_06_u:1387: sa yadyekaḥ paśuḥ syāt | ekaprādeśāṃ kuryādatha yadi pañca paśavaḥ syuḥ
GV03sb_06_u:1388: pañcaprādeśāṃ kuryādiṣumātrīṃ vā vīryaṃ vā iṣuvīryaṃsammitaiva tadbhavati
GV03sb_06_u:1391: atha tiraścīṃ rāsnām paryasyati | diśo haiva saitadvai devā imāṃlokānukhāṃ kṛtvā
GV03sb_06_u:1395: tāmuttare vitṛtīye paryasyati | atra haiṣāṃ lokānāmantāḥ samāyanti
GV03sb_06_u:1398: adityai rāsnāsīti | varuṇyā vai yajñe rajjuravaruṇyāmevaināmetadrāsnāṃ kṛtvā
GV03sb_06_u:1401: atha catasra ūrdhvāḥ karoti | tūṣṇīmeva diśo haiva tā etadvai devā imāṃlokānukhāṃ
GV03sb_06_u:1402: kṛtvā digbhiḥ sarvato 'dṛṃhaṃstathaivaitadyajamāna imāṃlokānukhāṃ kṛtvā digbhiḥ
GV03sb_06_u:1405: tā etā aitasyai bhavanti | etadvā etā etāmastabhnuvastathaivaināmetatstabhnuvanti
GV03sb_06_u:1406: tadyadata ūrdhvaṃ tadetayā tiraścyā dṛḍhamatha yadato 'rvāktadetābhiḥ
GV03sb_06_u:1408: tāsāmagreṣu stanānunnayanti | etadvai devā imāṃlokānukhāṃ kṛtvaitai stanaiḥ
GV03sb_06_u:1412: saiṣā gaureva | ime vai lokā ukheme lokā gaustasyā etadūdho yaiṣā tiraścī rāsnā sā
GV03sb_06_u:1415: tasyai stanānunnayati | ūdhasastatstanānunnayati sā catustanā bhavati catustanā hi
GV03sb_06_u:1418: tāṃ haike dvistanāṃ kurvanti | atho aṣṭastanāṃ na tathā kuryādye vai goḥ
GV03sb_06_u:1419: kanīyastanāḥ paśavo ye bhūyastanā anupajīvanīyatarā vā asyaite 'nupajīvanīyatarāṃ
GV03sb_06_u:1420: haināṃ te kurvate 'tho ha te na gāṃ kurvate śunīṃ vāviṃ vā vaḍabāṃ vā tasmāttathā
GV03sb_06_u:1423: athāsyai bilamabhipadyate | aditiṣṭe bilaṃ gṛbhṇātviti vāgvā aditiretadvā enāṃ devāḥ
GV03sb_06_u:1426: tām parigṛhya nidadhāti | kṛtvāya sā mahīmukhāmiti kṛtvāya sā
GV03sb_06_u:1427: mahatīmukhāmityetanmṛnmayīṃ yonimagnaya iti mṛnmayī hyeṣā yoniragneḥ
GV03sb_06_u:1428: putrebhyaḥ prāyacadaditiḥ śrapayānityetadvā enāmaditiḥ kṛtvā devebhyaḥ putrebhyaḥ
GV03sb_06_u:1431: tā haike tisraḥ kurvanti | trayo vā ime lokā ime lokā ukhā iti vadanto 'tho anyo
GV03sb_06_u:1433: yadītarāthetarasyāmiti na tathā kuryādyo vā eṣa nidhiḥ prathamo 'yaṃ sa loko yaḥ
GV03sb_06_u:1434: pūrva uddhirantarikṣaṃ tadya uttaro dyauḥ sātha yadetaccaturthaṃ yajurdiśo haiva
GV03sb_06_u:1435: tadetāvadvā idaṃ sarva yāvadime ca lokā diśaśca sa yadatropāharedati tadrecayedyadu
GV03sb_06_u:1436: vai yajñe'tiriktaṃ kriyate yajamānasya taddviṣantam bhrātṛvyamabhyatiricyate yadu
GV03sb_06_u:1439: tasyā etasyā aṣāḍhām pūrvāṃ karoti | iyaṃ vā aṣāḍheyamu vā eṣāṃ lokānām
GV03sb_06_u:1440: prathamāsṛjyata tāmetasyā eva mṛdaḥ karotyeṣāṃ hyeva lokānāmiyam mahiṣī karoti
GV03sb_06_u:1441: mahiṣī hīyaṃ tadyaiva prathamā vittā sā mahiṣī
GV03sb_06_u:1443: pādamātrī bhavati | pratiṣṭhā vai pāda iyamu vai pratiṣṭhā tryālikhitā bhavati
GV03sb_06_u:1446: athokhāṃ karoti | imāṃstallokānkarotyatha viśvajyotiṣaḥ karotyetā devatā agniṃ
GV03sb_06_u:1447: vāyumādityametā hyeva devatā viśvaṃ jyotistā etasyā eva mṛdaḥ
GV03sb_06_u:1448: karotyebhyastallokebhya etāndevānnirmimīte yajamānaḥ karoti tryalikhitā bhavanti
GV03sb_06_u:1451: athādhyātmam | ātmaivokhā vāgaṣāḍhā tām pūrvā karoti purastāddhīyamātmano
GV03sb_06_u:1452: vāktāmetasyā eva mṛdaḥ karotyātmano hyeveyaṃ vāṅnahiṣi karoti mahiṣī hi
GV03sb_06_u:1453: vāktryālikhitā bhavati tredhāvihitā hi vāgṛco yajūṃṣi sāmānyatho yadidaṃ trayaṃ vāco
GV03sb_06_u:1456: athokhāṃ karoti | ātmānaṃ tatkarotyatha viśvajyotiṣaḥ karoti prajā vai viśvajyotiḥ
GV03sb_06_u:1457: prajā hyeva viśvaṃ jyotiḥ prajananamevaitatkaroti tā etasyā eva mṛdaḥ
GV03sb_06_u:1458: karotyātmanastatprajāṃ nirmimīte yajamānaḥ karoti yajamānastadātmanaḥ prajāṃ
GV03sb_06_u:1459: karotyanantarhitāḥ karotya nantarhitāṃ tadātmanaḥ prajāṃ karotyuttarāḥ
GV03sb_06_u:1460: karotyuttarāṃ tadātmanaḥ prajāṃ karoti tryālikhitā bhavanti trivṛddhi prajātiḥ pitā
GV03sb_06_u:1463: tā etā yajuṣkṛtāyai karoti | ayajuṣkṛtāyā itarā niruktā eā bhavantyaniruktā itarāḥ
GV03sb_06_u:1467: parimitaścāparimitaśca tadyā yajuṣkṛtāyai karoti yadevāsya niruktam parimitaṃ
GV03sb_06_u:1468: rūpaṃ tadasya tena saṃskarotyatha yā ayajuṣkṛtāyai yadevāsyāniruktamaparimitaṃ
GV03sb_06_u:1469: rūpaṃ tadasya tena saṃskaroti sa ha vā etaṃ sarvaṃ kṛtsnam prajāpatiṃ saṃskaroti ya
GV03sb_06_u:1470: evaṃ vidvānetadevaṃ karotyathopaśayāyai piṇḍam pariśinaṣṭi prāyaścittibhyaḥ
GV03sb_06_u:1472: athaināṃ dhūpayati | sthemne nvevātho karmaṇaḥ prakṛtatāyai yadveva dhūpayati śira
GV03sb_06_u:1473: etadyajñasya yadukhā prāṇo dhūmaḥ śīrṣaṃstatprāṇaṃ dadhāti
GV03sb_06_u:1475: aśvaśakairdhūpayati | prājāpatyo vā aśvaḥ prajāpatiragnirno vā ātmātmānaṃ
GV03sb_06_u:1476: hinastyahiṃsāyai tadvai śaknaiva taddhi jagghaṃ yātayāma tatho ha naivāśvaṃ hinasti
GV03sb_06_u:1481: tvā devā vaiśvānarā dhūpayantvānuṣṭubhena candasāṅgirasvadindrastvā dhūpayatu
GV03sb_06_u:1484: saptāśvaśakāni bhavanti | spta yajūṃṣi saptatayya etā devatāḥ sapta śīrṣanprāṇā yadu
GV03sb_06_u:1485: vā api bahukṛtvaḥ sapta-sapta saptaiva tacīrṣaṇyeva tatsapta prāṇāndadhāti
GV03sb_06_u:1487: athainamasyāṃ khanati | etadvai devā abibhayuryadvai na imamiha rakṣāṃsi nāṣṭrā
GV03sb_06_u:1488: na hanyuriti tasmā imāmevātmānamakurvanguptyā ātmātmānaṃ gopsyatīti
GV03sb_06_u:1490: taṃ vā adityā khanati | iyaṃ vā aditirno vā ātmātmānaṃ hinastyahiṃsāyai yadanyayā
GV03sb_06_u:1493: aditiṣṭvā devī viśvadevyāvatī | pṛthivyāḥ sadhasthe aṅgirasvatkhanatvavaṭetyavaṭo
GV03sb_06_u:1494: haiṣa devatrātra sā vaiṇavyabhrirutsīdati catuḥsraktireṣa kūpo bhavati catasro vai
GV03sb_06_u:1496: racanamavadhāyāṣāḍhāmavadadhāti tūṣṇīmeva tāṃ hi pūrvāṃ karoti
GV03sb_06_u:1498: athokhāmavadadhāti | devānāṃ tvā patnīrdevīrviśvadevyāvatīḥ pṛthivyāḥ sadhasthe
GV03sb_06_u:1499: aṅgirasvaddadhatūkha iti devānāṃ haitāmagre patnīrdevīrviśvadevyāvatīḥ pṛthivyāḥ
GV03sb_06_u:1500: sadhasthe 'ṅgirasvaddadhustābhirevaināmetaddadhāti tā ha tā oṣadhaya evauṣadhayo
GV03sb_06_u:1505: dhiṣaṇāstvā devīḥ | viśvadevyāvatīḥ pṛthivyāḥ sadhasthe aṅgirasvadabhīndhatāmukha
GV03sb_06_u:1506: iti dhiṣaṇā haitāmagre devīrviśvadevyāvatīḥ pṛthivyāḥ sadhasthe 'ṅgirasvadabhīdhire
GV03sb_06_u:1507: tābhirevaināmetadabhīnddhe sā ha sā vāgeva vāgvai dhiṣaṇā vācā hīdaṃ
GV03sb_06_u:1508: sarvamiddhaṃ vācaivaināmetadabhīnddhe 'thaitāni trīṇi yajūṃṣīkṣamāṇa eva japati
GV03sb_06_u:1510: varūtrīṣṭvā devīḥ | viśvadevyāvatīḥ pṛthivyāḥ sadhastha aṅgirasvacrapayantūkha iti
GV03sb_06_u:1512: cakrustābhirevaināmetacrapayati tāni ha tānyahorātrāṇyevāhorātrāṇi vai varūtrayo
GV03sb_06_u:1515: gnāstvā devīḥ | viśvadevyāvatīḥ pṛthivyāḥ sadhasthe aṅgirasvatpacantūkha iti gnā
GV03sb_06_u:1517: 'ṅgirasvatpecustābhiravaināmetatpacati tāni ha tāni candāṃsyeva candāṃsi vai
GV03sb_06_u:1522: pṛthivyāḥ sadhasthe aṅgirasvatpecustābhirevaināmetatpacati tāni ha tāni
GV03sb_06_u:1523: nakṣatrāṇyeva nakṣatrāṇi vai janayo ye hi janāḥ puṇyakṛtaḥ svargaṃ lokaṃ yanti
GV03sb_06_u:1526: sa vai khanatyekena | avadadhātyekenābhīnddha ekena śrapayatyekena dvābhyām
GV03sb_06_u:1527: pacati tasmāddviḥ saṃvatsarasyānnam pacyate tāni ṣaṭ sampadyante ṣadṛtavaḥ
GV03sb_06_u:1530: atha mitrasya carṣaṇīdhṛta iti | maitreṇa yajuṣopanyācarati yāvatkiyaccopanyācarati
GV03sb_06_u:1531: na vai mitraṃ kaṃ cana hinasti na mitraṃ kaścana hinasti tatho haiṣa etāṃ na hinasti
GV03sb_06_u:1534: tāṃ sāvitreṇa yajuṣvodapati | savitā vai prasavitā savitṛprasūta evaināmetadudvapati
GV03sb_06_u:1535: devastvā savitodvapatu supāṇiḥ svaṅguriḥ subāhuruta śaktyeti sarvamu hyetatsavitā
GV03sb_06_u:1537: athainām paryāvartayati | avyathamānā pṛthivyāmāśā diśa āpṛṇetyavyathamānā tvam
GV03sb_06_u:1540: athaināmudyacati | utthāya bṛhatī bhavetyutthāya hīme lokā bṛhanta udu tiṣṭha
GV03sb_06_u:1541: dhruvā tvamityudu tiṣṭha sthirā tvam pratiṣṭhitetyetat
GV03sb_06_u:1543: tām parigṛhya nidadhāti | mitraitāṃ ta ukhā paridadāmyabhittyā eṣā mā bhedityayaṃ
GV03sb_06_u:1544: vai vāyurmitro yo 'yam pavate tasmā evaināmetatparidadāti guptyai te heme lokā
GV03sb_06_u:1545: mitraguptāstasmādeṣāṃ lokānāṃ na kiṃ cana mīyate
GV03sb_06_u:1547: athaināmācṛṇatti | sthemne nvevātho karmaṇaḥ prakṛtatāyai yadvevācūṇatti śira
GV03sb_06_u:1548: etadyajñasya yadukhā prāṇaḥ payaḥ śīrpastatprāṇaṃ dadhātyatho yoṣā vā ukhā
GV03sb_06_u:1551: ajāyai payasācṛṇatti | prajāpatervai śokādajā samabhavanprajāpatiragnirno vā
GV03sb_06_u:1552: ātmātmānaṃ hinastyahiṃsāyai yadvevājāyā ajā ha sarvā oṣadhīratti
GV03sb_06_u:1559: karoti tābhirdhūpayati tābhirācṛṇatti yo vāva karma karoti sa evaṃ tasyopacāraṃ veda
GV03sb_06_u:1562: bhūyāṃsi havīṃṣi bhavanti | agnicityāyāṃ yadu cānagnicityāyāmatīni ha karmāṇi santi
GV03sb_06_u:1566: āgnāvaiṣṇava ekādaśakapālaḥ | tadadhvarasya dīkṣaṇīyaṃ vaiśvānaro dvādaśakapāla
GV03sb_06_u:1569: sa yadāgnāvaiṣṇavameva nirvapet | netare haviṣī adhvarasyaiva dīkṣaṇīyaṃ kṛtaṃ
GV03sb_06_u:1570: syānnāgneratha yaditare eva haviṣī nirvapennāgnāvaiṣṇavamagnereva dīkṣaṇīyaṃ
GV03sb_06_u:1576: sa ya eṣa āgnāvaiṣṇavaḥ | tasya tadeva brāhmaṇaṃ yatpuraścaraṇe vaiśvānaro
GV03sb_06_u:1578: dvādaśakapālo dvādaśa māsāḥ saṃvatsaraḥ saṃvatsaro vaiśvānaraḥ
GV03sb_06_u:1580: yadvevaitaṃ vaiśvānaraṃ nirvapati | vaiśvānaraṃ vā etamagniṃ janayiṣyanbhavati
GV03sb_06_u:1581: tametatpurastāddīkṣaṇīyāyāṃ reto bhūtaṃ siñcati yādṛgvai yonau retaḥ sicyate
GV03sb_06_u:1582: tādṛgjāyate tadyadetamatra vaiśvānaraṃ reto bhūtaṃ siñcati tasmādeṣo 'mutra
GV03sb_06_u:1585: yadvevaite haviṣī nirvapati | kṣatraṃ vai vaiśvānaro viḍeṣa ādityaścaruḥ kṣatraṃ ca
GV03sb_06_u:1586: tadviśaṃ ca karoti vaiśvānaram pūrvaṃ nirvapati kṣatraṃ tatkṛtvā viśe karoti
GV03sb_06_u:1588: eka eṣa bhavati | ekadevatya ekasthaṃ tatkṣatramekasthāṃ śriyaṃ karoti caruritaro
GV03sb_06_u:1589: bahudevatyo bhūmā vā eṣa taṇḍulānāṃ yaccarurbhūmo eṣa devānāṃ yadādityā viśi
GV03sb_06_u:1592: athādhyātmam | śira eva vaiśvānara ātmaiṣa ādityaścaruḥ śiraśca tadātmānaṃ ca
GV03sb_06_u:1593: karoti vaiśvānaram pūrvaṃ nirvapati śirastatkṛtvātmānaṃ karoti
GV03sb_06_u:1595: eka eṣa bhavati | ekamiva hi śiraścaruritaro bahudevatyo bhūmā vā eṣa taṇḍulānāṃ
GV03sb_06_u:1598: ghṛta eṣa bhavati | ghṛtabhājanā hyādityāḥ svenaivainānetadbhāgena svena rasena
GV03sb_06_u:1599: prīṇātyupāṃśvetāni havīṃṣi bhavanti reto vā atra yajña upāṃśu vai retaḥ sicyate
GV03sb_06_u:1605: tāni vai bhūyāṃsi bhavanti | agnicityāyāṃ yadu cānagnicityāyāṃ tasyākto
GV03sb_06_u:1608: pañcādvarasya juhoti | pāṅkto yajño yāvānyajño yāvatyasya mātrā
GV03sb_06_u:1609: tāvataivainametadreto bhūtaṃ siñcati saptāgneḥ saptacitiko 'gniḥ sapta 'rtavaḥ
GV03sb_06_u:1611: siñcati tānyubhayāni dvādaśa sampadyante dvādaśa māsāḥ saṃvatsaraḥ saṃvatsaro
GV03sb_06_u:1614: sa juhoti | ākūtimagniṃ prayujaṃ svāhetyākūtādvā etadagre karma
GV03sb_06_u:1617: mano meghāmagnim prayujaṃ svāheti | manaso vā etadagre karma
GV03sb_06_u:1620: cittaṃ vijñātamagnim prayujaṃ svāheti | cittādvā etadagre karma
GV03sb_06_u:1623: vāco vidhṛtimagnim prayujaṃ svāheti | vāco vā etadagre karma
GV03sb_06_u:1626: prajāpataye manave svāheti | prajāpatirvai manuḥ sa hīdaṃ sarvamamanuta
GV03sb_06_u:1629: agnaye vaiśvānarāya svāheti | saṃvatsaro vā agnirvaiśvānaraḥ saṃvatsaro vā etadagre
GV03sb_06_u:1632: atha sāvitrīṃ juhoti | savitā vā etadagre karmākarottamevaitadetasmai karmaṇe
GV03sb_06_u:1633: prayuṅkte viśvo devasya neturmarto vurīta sakhyam viśvo rāya iṣudhyati dyumnaṃ

GV03sb_06_u:2295: pratiṣṭhā tadyatrāsya sarvasya pratiṣṭhā tadenatpratiṣṭhāpya yadatrāgneyaṃ
GV03sb_06_u:2299: āpo devīḥ | pratigṛbhṇīta bhasmaitatsyone kṛṇudhvaṃ surabhā u loka iti jagdhaṃ vā
GV03sb_06_u:2300: etadyātayāma bhavati tadetadāha srabhiṣṭha enalloke kurudhvamiti tasmai
GV03sb_06_u:2301: namantāṃ janaya ityāpo vai janayo 'dbhyo hīdaṃ sarvaṃ jāyate supatnīrityagninā vā
GV03sb_06_u:2302: āpaḥ supatnyo māteva putram bibhṛtāpsvenadini yathā mātā putramapasthe
GV03sb_06_u:2306: ityoṣadhīrhyeṣo 'nurudhyate garbho sanjāyase punariti garbho hyeṣa sanjāyate
GV03sb_06_u:2307: punargarbho asyoṣadhīnāṃ garbho vanaspatīnām garbho viśvasya bhūtasyāgne
GV03sb_06_u:2308: garbho apāmasīti tadenamasya sarvasya garbhaṃ karoti
GV03sb_06_u:2314: athāpādatte | tadyadatrāgneyaṃ tadetadadbhyo 'dhi janayatyanayānayā vai bheṣajaṃ
GV03sb_06_u:2316: iti prasanno hyeṣa bhasmanā yonimapaśca pṛthivīṃ ca bhavati saṃsṛjya
GV03sb_06_u:2317: mātṛbhiṣṭvaṃ jyotiṣmānpunarāsada iti saṃgatya mātṛbhiṣṭvaṃ jyotiṣmānpunarāsada
GV03sb_06_u:2318: ityetatpunarāsadya sadanam punarūrjā saha rayyetyetena māsarveṇābhinivartasvetyetat
GV03sb_06_u:2325: apādāya bhasmanaḥ pratyetya | ukhāyāmopyopatiṣṭhata etadvā etadayathāyathaṃ
GV03sb_06_u:2329: bodhā me asya vacaso yaviṣṭheti | bodha me 'sya vacaso
GV03sb_06_u:2330: yaviṣṭhetyetanmaṃhiṣṭhasya prabhṛtasya svadhāva iti bhūyiṣṭhasya prabhṛtasya
GV03sb_06_u:2331: svadhāva ityetatpīyati tvo anu tvo gṛṇātīti pīyatyeko 'nveko gṛṇāti vandāruṣṭe
GV03sb_06_u:2332: tanvaṃ vande agna iti vanditā te 'haṃ tanvaṃ vande 'gna ityetatsa bodhi sūrirmaghavā
GV03sb_06_u:2334: yuyādevametadāha dvābhyāmupatiṣṭhate gāyatryā ca triṣṭubhā ca tasyokto bandhuḥ
GV03sb_06_u:2336: tāni nava bhavanti | nava diśo diśo 'gnirnava prāṇāḥ prāṇā agniryāvānagniryāvatyasya
GV03sb_06_u:2339: atha prāyaścittī karoti | sarvebhyo vā eṣa etaṃ kāmebhya ādhatte tadyadevāsyātra
GV03sb_06_u:2341: saṃdadhātyubhe prāyaścittī karoti ye evāgnāvanugate tasyokto bandhuḥ
GV03sb_06_u:2343: tāni daśa bhavanti | daśākṣarā virāḍvirāḍagnirdeśa diśo diśo 'gnirdaśa prāṇāḥ prāṇā
